q: X Factor'' involved the revelation that the pitch-correcting software Auto-Tune was used on at least one contestant's taped audition. Simon Cowell said Monday it was the work of sound technicians and done without his knowledge. Once we found out what was going on it was stopped immediately.... The most important part was once the show went live and( viewers) could see that everyone was singing live and it was a proper, fair competition.
